main.name: Avishak
main.description: I am fond of working with Android and Frontend web development
main.bio: Curious to know about new technologies and love to play Piano and sing.Much Confusing and emotional human being. Interested about getting familiar with new people and work with them. Always try to think about new ideas that can make some good changes to the society.
main.contactmessage: You can contact using linkedin or facebook or can send email to me.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Developed two desktop games(Snake and Chess Club) and one Android Application(Bohon) as academic projects. Recently working with MERN stack web development.
Regional 2nd runners up in the National Physics Olympiad, 1st runners up in the Regional Science Olympiad and the Regional Bangla language competetion

projects.title: Chess Club
projects.category: A simple multiplayer chess application for desktop built using JAVA Fx
